戩字的基本解释

戩
jiǎn
同“戬”。

戩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》即淺切，上彌，精。］
“戬1”的繁体字。“戬1”的旧字形。
(1)幸福，吉祥。
(2)歼灭；剪除。

戩字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【戈字部】　戩； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页413第30
【唐韻】卽淺切【集韻】【韻會】子淺切，?音翦。盡也。【詩·小雅】俾爾戩穀。【註】俾爾盡善，有以受天之祿也。　又與翦通。【說文】滅也。【詩·魯頌】實始翦商。古本作戩。聞人氏曰：戩與翦同。　又【集韻】旨善切，音?。義同。　又【集韻】【類篇】?子賤切，音箭。義同。孫炎說。

[Mao Collection] [Ge Zi Department] 　戬; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 413 30
[Tang Yun] Shallow cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Shallow cut,? Yin Jian. Do it all. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Bierjian Valley. [Note] Bale's goodness is good enough to receive the reward of the sky.　Connect with Jiang again. [Said the text] Mie also. 【Poetry·Lu Song】Shi Shi Jian Shang. The ancient book is composed. Wen Renshi said: Jian and Jian are the same.　[Jiyun] The purpose is good, sound?. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Zi Jian cut, sound arrow. The same meaning. Sun Yan said.
